At #LFC Thiago is more exposed this season than he was at Bayern and getting through more defensive work that detracts from his ability on the ball. It’s where Klopp is missing the physical presence and aggression of Fabinho & Henderson in the centre of the park. [@TheAthleticUK]

Looking at his profile when playing in a defensive midfield role, Thiago is making a higher volume of tackles, blocks & fouls (disrupting opposition moves 99 out of 99), and engaging in more aerial duels (90 of 99). More defensive activity just isn’t his game. [@TheAthleticUK]

Thiago is committing more fouls per game (3 p/ 90) than any other regular starter in the PL so far this season. That’s a significant increase compared to Thiago’s time in Germany where he averaged less than two fouls p/ 90 across his seven-year spell with Bayern. [@TheAthleticUK]
